name: XWidget
description: XWidget is a powerful desktop widget customization engine. It's light, handy with smooth animations. Built-in powerful visual widget editor and widgets online gallery. You can download more then 1600+ widgets from the built-in gallery with just one-click.
minimum_requirements: Mínimos: Sistema Operativo: Windows 7,8,8.1,10 Memória: 128 MB de RAM Espaço no disco: Requer 50 MB de espaço livre
